title: Who has the best dance?
body: Who has the better dance, Star Guardian Lux or Popstar Ahri?

replies.body:
Anyone who has a troll-y dance.
Nasus, Trundle, Nunu, Nautilus, etc.

> [{quoted}](name=SnoKingXBL,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hP0fAAVu,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-27T06:44:41.075+0000)
>
> Anyone who has a troll-y dance.
> Nasus, Trundle, Nunu, Nautilus, etc.

im askin between the 2 xD
I read the post. Troll-y dances surpass any other dances. Even Warwick's swag-like running animation.
Warwicks animation is from the Michal Jackson, thriller video.
Not listing garen and Battlecast Skarner. Being this pleb :/

> [{quoted}](name=redniwediS,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=hP0fAAVu,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-27T06:58:31.998+0000)
>
> Is this really a question?{{champion:86}}

The Question is between Lux and Ahri since they both have skins and new dance animations to that

> The Question is between Lux and Ahri since they both have skins and new dance animations to that

Doesnt matter Garen still has the best Johhny bravo monkey dance.
The correct answer was no, the monkey is best dance all years, all regions.
I'd say Lux... but {{champion:102}}'s dance is the best and nothing anyone can say will convince me otherwise XD
Ahri, but Malzahar just destroys both.
Malzahars dance is from MC hammer, can't touch this.

Popstar Ahri, because she has two dances.

Recall OP.

Amumu.

But on a serious note, there is no reason to ask this question really as it's completely personal opinion.
